aside.is_not_in_census: You are not in the census
aside.overwrite_votes_left_one: You can correct your vote once.
aside.overwrite_votes_left_other: You can correct your vote up to {{ count }} times.

banner.subtitle: Use wallet addresses, vote with an ERC20 token or with NFTs!
banner.title: Voting for DAOs & Web3 communities

banner_voting_types.anonymous_description: Voters' identities remain completely confidential, thanks to cutting-edge zk-SNARKS technology.
banner_voting_types.flexible_description: Customize your voting process and participant list to fit your community unique requirements.
banner_voting_types.token_description: Vote with ERC20/ERC721 (NFT's) or add your own token and vote gasless with them.

actions.cancel: Cancel the process immediately, not allowing new votes and not counting any results (caution: it cannot be reverted)
actions.continue: Resume the process immediately, in case it has been paused
actions.end: End the process immediately, preventing new votes to be submitted, and shows the voting results (caution: it cannot be reverted)
actions.error_title: There was some error while executing the transaction
actions.pause: Pause the voting process temporarily, until resumed manually. While the process is paused, voters cannot submit votes.

cc.empty: Apparently this process has no questions

errors.wrong_data_description: The specified data is not correct

results.secret_until_the_end: Secret until the end. The results will be available when the process ends at {{ endDate }}
results.title: Results for "{{ title }}"

vote.voted_description: To verify your vote, you can use this unique id: {{ id }}

error.invalid_cell_data: Some rows do not contain correct addresses: {{rows,list(style:short)}}
error.invalid_row_length: Correct document lines {{rows,list(style: short)}} and load it again
error.invalid_weight_type: Expecting weight in first column at lines {{rows,list(style:short)}}, but found unexpected data
error.not_found: Sorry, the page you were looking for was not found

error_text: Sorry, the page you were looking for was not found

faucet.description: For developing with Vocdoni, you need tokens for certain actions (create an election, change election status, etc.). The nÂº of  different factors lik census size, election duration, election params, etc.

general_information.description: When you request dev tokens, you'll receive 250 tokens. You can claim from the faucet once every 24 hours.
general_information.description2: If you need more tokens for developing on top of the Vocdoni stack, you can connect with us at tokens (at) vocdoni.io
general_information.title: General Information

request_tokens.description: To prevent faucet botting, you must connect your web3 wallet and sign in. We request read-only access.
request_tokens.title: Request Tokens

faucet.title: Vocdoni Tokens Faucet

account_create.description_helper: A brief description of your organization

error.min_address: Please, provide at least one address

anonymous.description: Voters' identities will be fully anonymized, including for the organizer. They will be required to set a password to ensure the confidentiality of their identity.
anonymous.title: Anonymous

overwrite.description: If checked, the votes would have the option to correct their vote once.
overwrite.title: Vote overwrite

secret.description: Results will be available when the process ends instead of being available in realtime.
secret.title: Secret until the end

calendar.end_date_description: This voting will start at {{ date.begin, format }} and end at {{ date.end, format }}, lasting ~{{ date, duration }}
calendar.end_date_title_helper: Define the exact date and time to conclude.
calendar.start_date_description: Define when the proposal should be active to recive votes. If "Now" is selected, the proposal is inmediatly active after publishing.
calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.title_description: Specify the active period to recive votes.

census.description: Select how voters will authenticate and identify themselves: options include custom data, token ownership or wallet addresses.
census.spreadsheet_description: Such as usernames and passwords, or voter personal information, can be utilized for authentication with a form.
census.title: Census
census.token_base_description: Use a token (EVM based) to enable voting based on users' token ownership.
census.wallet_address_description: Identify voters by their wallets addresses.

confirm.census_preview_is_shortened: (preview list is limited to {{ limit }} results)
confirm.census_total_people_one: A single person will be elegible for voting in this process
confirm.census_total_people_other: {{ count }} people will be elegible for voting in this process
confirm.confirmation_terms_and_conditions: I accept the <link>Terms and Conditions</link> of Vocdoni
confirm.confirmation_valid_info: I assure that this information is correct and valid
confirm.cost_preview: Creating this process will have a cost of {{ cost }} votokens (you currently have {{ balance }})
confirm.not_enough_tokens: You don't have enough tokens to create this process, please get some
confirm.title: Title

process_create.confirm_spreadsheet_removal: Are you sure? Take in mind that the uploaded file will be removed

meta.description: Provide a clear title & description. This will help voters understand the purpose of the voting process.
meta.description_helper: A brief description of your voting process
meta.title: Voting Info

question.description: Add the question/s along with the options that your voters will need to choose from. You have the flexibility to add multiple questions, each with a customized number of selectable options.
question.description_placeholder: Write here a description of the question (optional)
question.title: Questions

spreadsheet.download_template_description: Download the original template to complete your voter list

preview.description: Members must complete this form to access the voting
preview.title: Form preview
preview.upload_new_list: Upload a new list of voters

requirements.list_one: The first row will be used as the name of the fields that voters will need to fill out.
requirements.list_two: Fields do not distinguish between uppercase and lowercase letters, white spaces will be ignored, and diacritics will be transformed into simple letters.
requirements.list_three: If 'Weighted Vote' is selected, the first column must be an integer indicating the voter's vote weight.
requirements.title: Requirements

process_create.success_description: Redirecting you to the voting process page...
process_create.unhealthy_account: You need to create an organization before creating the first voting process.

elections_list_empty.alt: Image illustrating that the organization is empty
elections_list_empty.description: As an organizer, you possess the ability to create customized voting processes for your community. These voting procedures offer a wide range of flexibility, including options such as a census where voters are required to authenticate using custom data (such as username, password, and birthday), a token-based system that allows all tokenholders to participate, or a whitelist that utilizes wallet addresses for eligibility.
elections_list_empty.footer: Learn more about creating voting processes <customLink>in this guide</customLink>.
elections_list_empty.not_owner: This organization has no voting processes yet
elections_list_empty.title: Create your first voting process

process.is_invalid: This process has wrong data, thus making it invalid
process.share_caption: I've just cast my vote in {{ title }}!!

confirm.question: Question
confirm.text1: Before casting your vote review that everything is correct.

status.paused_description: It's not possible to vote right now

success_modal.text:
Your vote has been cast and stored securely in the Vocdoni Blockchain. You can check here.

Democracy is important, you can share it with your community and friends:
success_modal.title: Vote cast successfully!

process_create.creation_steps_description: The voting process is being created. This process can last a bit (don't close this window), as it is registering all the information in the secure & private Vocdoni Blockchain.
process_create.do_not_close: This action can take some time, don't close this window

uploader.click_or_drag_and_drop: <p1>Upload or drag and drop the voter list here</p1><p2>(Allowed formats: CSV, XLSX, and ODS)</p2>
